pull.title: refactor: Drop ::HasWallets()
pull.body: Minor follow-up of #19250. The global `HasWallets()` is used only once and at the call site there's already a way to know if any wallet is loaded.

events.body: ACK ccf1f6ea24905876f35e685204cb2293cf083e97, I have reviewed the changes and they look OK, I agree they can be merged.

comments.body: Why it is safe do not lock `cs_wallets` now?
I presume for the same reason that it is safe to return wallets[0] without the lock. cs_wallets only protects vpwallets, not copies of the shared pointers.
